doc.title: WFLD 32 News in the Morning
doc.plot: Morning program featuring Bob Sirott and Marianne Murciano, which featured news,weather, sports,and traffic. Other segments include Coffee Cam in which they interviewed people and offer them mugs from their Box-of-Mugs,Random Tape, A Look Outside, 15 Minutes of Something, Danushia's Shoes (fashion news) and Extermely Local News.
